channel.title: Comments on: Anecdotes about SQL AKA post 400
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.content:encoded:
The first time I started to manipulate information with T-SQL.

I saw the power that lay in what is such a simple language, it greatly improved my lateral thinking and logical thought processes.

Now I get to play with the likes of SQL 2008 Server R2 and write cool C#/.NET code to interact with SQL.

Great time to be a techie right now
